department.dept_long_name: Department of East Asian Languages and Civilizations

course.title: Topics in Early Medieval Literature
course.description: Topic for fall term is poetry and poetics from the late Eastern Han through Sui. Spring term topic: The fall of the South in mid-sixth century and the subsequent displacement of many southerners to north China was a traumatic event for Southern Dynasties elite. We will discuss the writing of trauma, diaspora and nostalgia in this period with focus on the use of poetry as a medium of writing the history of self and state.
